stories.headline: Boxing results: Shakur dominates Lopez; Carrington wins title
stories.description: Shakur Stevenson outpointed Teofimo Lopez Jr. to win the WBO junior welterweight world title.

stories.headline: Highway 99 in Tulare County reopens after 59-vehicle pileup, CHP says
stories.description: Highway 99 reopens after a 59-vehicle pileup near Earlimart.

stories.headline: Donald Trump’s unprecedented political war chest got even bigger in 2025
stories.description: Trump's fundraising dominance continues, campaign finance details revealed.

stories.headline: Virginia woman was strangled with her child sleeping nearby, authorities say. Who was behind the deadly attack?
stories.description: Virginia woman strangled in her sleep while her child slept nearby.

stories.headline: Iran’s Gen Z Helped Propel the Protests. They Paid With Their Lives.
stories.description: A generation who grew up in a more connected world rebelled against a failing economy and strict social rules
